sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: This package provides libopenquicktime library and utilities that allow you to manipulate Quicktime files.

sect3.title: dechunk
sect3.para: dechunk extracts RGB frames from a movie and writes them as PPM images.

sect3.title: make_streamable
sect3.para: This program makes the Quicktime file streamable.

sect3.title: qtdump
sect3.para: qtdump dumps all tables in movie.

sect3.title: qtinfo
sect3.para: qtinfo reads all the information about the file.

sect3.title: recover
sect3.para: This program recovers JPEG and PCM audio from a corrupted movie.
